title: poverty
comment: The state of being without material possessions or wealth. Scripture indicates that poverty is contrary to God's intention for his people, and that those who are poor and destitute are to be treated with special consideration and compassion.

children.title: poverty, causes of

children.title: poverty, spiritual
children.comment: The lack of spiritual riches and gifts is seen by Scripture as an especially distressing cause of poverty. Awareness of spiritual poverty leads to a turning towards God in order to receive the riches he graciously offers through the gospel.
